definition: don't tell me .../could it be that...?

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Do not you just let me look at this hole in it?
sentences.chinese: 难道你就是让我看这个小洞洞吗？

sentences.english: Have you only remembered Dong Ying and Tong?
sentences.chinese: 难道你只记得董颖和彤了吗？

sentences.english: Don't you ever get bored waiting in traffic?
sentences.chinese: 在车阵中等候你难道不会嫌烦吗？

sentences.english: And shall we crouch above these graves.
sentences.chinese: 难道我们理应蜷伏在他们的墓穴上。

sentences.english: And then all this earthquake happened, I thought, is that Karma?-when you are not nice that bad things happen to you.
sentences.chinese: 然后地震发生了，我当时就想，这难道是因果报应？

sentences.english: Do investors not like the company?
sentences.chinese: 难道投资者看不上这家公司？

sentences.english: Can they not see the madness that lies within the Witch King?
sentences.chinese: 他们难道看不到巫王的疯狂？

sentences.english: She had been sitting on them for a very long time.
sentences.chinese: 难道长得丑是一种罪吗？

sentences.english: Maybe the intelligent person ain't so smart after all?
sentences.chinese: 可能，难道这个有才智的人并不聪明？

sentences.english: You have other plans on a Wednesday afternoon?
sentences.chinese: 难道你星期三下午还有其他安排吗？

sentences.english: Don't be loaded , let everybody thought that you have more pitiful?
sentences.chinese: 难道是装的，让大家以为你有多可怜？

sentences.english: Those early years' folding Ru old grudge have already eliminated thin?
sentences.chinese: 难道当年的折辱仇恨已经消淡了？

sentences.english: Can you not understand that liberty is worth more than ribbons?
sentences.chinese: 你难道不明白自由比绶带更有价值吗？

sentences.english: Could this be the burial shroud of Jesus Christ?
sentences.chinese: 这难道就是耶稣的裹尸布？

sentences.english: Oughtn’t you to give us a chance to try ?
sentences.chinese: 你难道不应该给我们一个尝试的机会吗？
难道一切都毫无疑问地丧失殆尽了吗？

definition: youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
(coll.) As a matter of fact, ... (used to introduce evidence for what one has just asserted)
dialectal equivalent of 為什麼|为什么[wei4 shen2 me5]
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
unexpectedly/to one's surprise/go so far as to
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
